name: Laserlight Dragon
description:
Laserlight Dragon is a creature made entirely of light. Move and rotate items to guide yourself through this world of prisms, lenses and mirrors.

This unique little optics game has been created, to let you experience the laws of reflection and refraction. It will give you and your children an intuitive grasp on the subject as well as a deeper understanding about the behavior of light towards lenses, mirrors and prisms.
